name: Nahualli
description:
Nahualli

Nahualli is a 3D Third Person, Hack and Slash, Single Player PC game where you take control of Alma and her Eagle AI companion in their fight against the Nahual's forces!

Players must defeat the evil forces that have swarmed Alma's home orphanage where she had lived most of her life. The placed is under lockdown and everything is burning to ground! Slay the evil Fire Witches away before it's too late! The game is based upon the Mexican Colonial era and the Myth of the Nahual.

Nahualli was developed during the Game Design Course at Vancouver Film School as a Mid-Term Student Project, it's usually referred to as a "2 month Game Jam". Its objective was to demonstrate Game Design, Programming and Art skills throughout a short period of time during classes.

The project was made between 4 people:

Yeshua Aguilar - Artist

Bishwajit Mukherjee- Programmer

Alexander Tu - Level Designer

Miguel Villasis - Project Manager/Programmer
